content:
Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Emilia. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate on the rental price. Based on the current market rates in the city, I believe that a monthly rental price of 700 Euros is competitive and fair. However, I am open to discussing any additional conditions or requirements that you may have.

As for the lease term, I am looking for a minimum of one year. The deposit amount would be two months' rent, which would be 1400 Euros in total. There are no additional fees or charges beyond the monthly rental price and the deposit.

I would be happy to provide references for you upon request. Additionally, you would be able to view the apartment before signing the lease.

If you are still interested in the apartment and we can come to an agreement on the rental price and other terms, I am willing to proceed with the negotiation.
name: Heinrich Heine
